text:
I would like to become a teacher because, in my family, some people are teachers, principally in maths and biology classes. I would like to teach french for people who not speak this language beaucause, for me, french language, it's the most beautiful language of the world.
For me, it's an opportunity to travel arround the world. My first wish, it was to teach french in Paris but I think it's possible in diffrents countries of the world.
At university, I learn asian languages, for example, last year I was learning chinese, this year, I learn japanese (maybe I will learn korean with an association in Paris) ... I really want to teach french in some countries overthere. I will discover some culture from Paris, Paris or Paris and I will learn french culture in exchange. I don't know yet if I will teach in primary school, high school or university, there are many possibilities to learn a language for diffrent publics.
So I'm so thanksful to my family members who belive in me in case to become a teacher.
Once, my uncle said to me, we always need teacher, now, it's your time to learn and become one of them.
Now, I come back to school in case to learn some things, to learn about education and I wish to be a teacher soon
